name: A Fishload of Space
description:
A Fishload of Space is a 3D side-scrolling game with bullet hell features. 

The player is a fish astronaut escaping from the evil Sharkbot who is abducting all the fishes to turn them into machines in order to rule the whole space. 

In his quest to free its kind from Sharkbot, the fish astronaut will have to avoid many dangers and use its former friends turned into laser-guns. 

Developed by QuaranTuna GameStudios:

Riccardo "LombRicc" Lombardi / Game Designer

Davide"Aze" Aldegheri / Programmer

Philip "Peanut" Nuss / Programmer

Curzio "Liberi Arcano" Ferrara / 3D Artist and Animator

Frderico "Ciabatta" Soffiantini / 2D Artist

James "The Blind Guy" Bockover McCormick / Sound Artist and Musican
developers: T h e  B l i n d  G u y
